<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">MSFBuilder &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a new &#96;MSFBuilder&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param BlockSize The internal block size used by the PDB file.  See</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// isValidBlockSize() for a list of valid block sizes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param MinBlockCount Causes the builder to reserve up front space for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// at least &#96;MinBlockCount&#96; blocks.  This is useful when using &#96;MSFBuilder&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to read an existing MSF that you want to write back out later.  The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// original MSF file&#39;s SuperBlock contains the exact number of blocks used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// by the file, so is a good hint as to how many blocks the new MSF file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will contain.  Furthermore, it is actually necessary in this case.  To</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// preserve stability of the file&#39;s layout, it is helpful to try to keep</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// all streams mapped to their original block numbers.  To ensure that this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is possible, space for all blocks must be allocated beforehand so that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// streams can be assigned to them.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param CanGrow If true, any operation which results in an attempt to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// locate a free block when all available blocks have been exhausted will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// allocate a new block, thereby growing the size of the final MSF file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When false, any such attempt will result in an error.  This is especially</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// useful in testing scenarios when you know your test isn&#39;t going to do</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// anything to increase the size of the file, so having an Error returned if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// it were to happen would catch a programming error</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns an llvm::Error representing whether the operation succeeded or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// failed.  Currently the only way this can fail is if an invalid block size</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is specified, or &#96;MinBlockCount&#96; does not leave enough room for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mandatory reserved blocks required by an MSF file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;MSFBuilder&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a8c21485958080726f29f691b4cbfcf00">create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocbasic-cpp/#ad5d00e1d77644d95847b9bf8da12b759">Allocator</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     uint32&#95;t MinBlockCount = 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CanGrow = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Request the block map to be at a specific block address.  This is useful</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// when editing a MSF and you want the layout to be as stable as possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a1af64821af285e06f73d4f9bae60b68a">setBlockMapAddr</a>(uint32&#95;t Addr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a3da93abaa67b0e96193734c8084fd3ce">setDirectoryBlocksHint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> DirBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a81dc1a77bc37730b480a4156fd73acbf">setFreePageMap</a>(uint32&#95;t Fpm);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af49f1e6ad306896b15614ee4c85dae63">setUnknown1</a>(uint32&#95;t Unk1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add a stream to the MSF file with the given size, occupying the given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// list of blocks.  This is useful when reading a MSF file and you want a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// particular stream to occupy the original set of blocks.  If the given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks are already allocated, or if the number of blocks specified is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// incorrect for the given stream size, this function will return an Error.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4">addStream</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> Blocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add a stream to the MSF file with the given size, occupying any available</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks that the builder decides to use.  This is useful when building a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// new PDB file from scratch and you don&#39;t care what blocks a stream occupies</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// but you just want it to work.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4">addStream</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks as needed to match the requested size.  This can fail if &#96;CanGrow&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
